lenders.name: Heather

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because:
My son showed me this site.  I work in a restaurant. One of our regular customers recently passed away.  The elderly gentleman had always been lighthearted and sociable. He continued to  brighten the day of people around him even after suffering a stroke.. His family gave me a gift of money for my kindness to their father.  This  money, I am passing along to help others.  Seemed like a very good thing to do with it.
I chose to donate to a person working in agriculture as I worked and grew up on a farm.
lenders.occupational_info: I have quit working at the restaurant.  I now help care for our grandson while my daughter is at work.  I have also joined a craft group at the church I attend.  We make mostly knitted or crochet projects which are sold to help raise money to support the church and help others.

lenders.name: Lora

lenders.occupational_info: I help charitable organizations raise money. Mostly, I work with agencies that help children. My clients are all over the United States.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I am so very lucky.  I am healthy.  I am surrounded by family and friends.  And, I am self-employed doing something which I LOVE -- so it doesn't even feel like work.  What little I loan out is my small way of spreading the love.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of dogs, cats, most any pet a person can have -- except I'm squeamish about snakes.  I'm truly blessed to be able to support myself taking care of some of God's wonderful creatures.

Brendan Robert Talley
October 30th, 1990 to August 10th, 2009
lenders.occupational_info: In remembrance.

lenders.name: Christopher & Sara
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with more than enough, and this is one of many ways to give and help those who need it.  We love the concept of this program, and hope that everyone who is a part of it is blessed with success in their business.

lenders.name: Elias
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people standing on their own feet

We started the LOTUS team to do our little bit on Kiva. It is a wonderful experience connecting with people world-wide on Kiva.org.

Por eso estoy desarrollando un proyecto de servicios a distancia, vender dietas y servicios a través de internet. Necesito dinero para equipo, accesorios del pc, una video y cámara de fotos.
lenders.occupational_info: Soy nutricionista dietista, egresada de la facultad de medicina. Realizo, dietas, planes de alimentación para personas en general y organizo planes de menú para las familias. Todo esto lo realizo a distancia, a través de internet. También ofresco realizar asesoramiento a empresas de alimentos. Cursos de nutrición a distancia.

lenders.name: Carol Jane
lenders.loan_because: because I can.

lenders.name: Moreau Catholic
lenders.loan_because: As a Holy Cross high school, we believe in the importance of helping our students become responsible citizens of our global community. Lending through Kiva provides students an opportunity by which they can become part of helping others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a co-educational college preparatory high school in the Holy Cross tradition located in Hayward, CA. As an innovative 21st century one-to-one laptop school, we believe in helping students understand their role in the larger global society.

lenders.name: Letra
lenders.occupational_info:
Resiliently unemployed and, And I'm wanting   to open my own Cleaning Service, With BONUS Building Care Opening it will give me more time to spend with my boys.Each BONUS Building Care customer receives a cleaning schedule customized for their facility. Your cleaning schedule can be designed to fit the needs of your workplace no matter how unique it may be. Our cleaning goals are to make sure your goals for cleaning are met in your working environment.  
Decades of experience in the cleaning industry has prepared the management at BONUS Building Care to customize a program of cleaning that will effectively manage and perform the cleaning tasks required in your workplace.

Nightly Cleaning Procedures are conducted by: 

Insured, bonded security conscious cleaning crews 
Trained personnel equipped with commercial
equipment 
Inspected by our operations staff for quality insurance 
Our Customer Service and communication programs enable you, the customer, to control the level of attention and service you receive.

We have the solution to any cleaning problem you may have and would like the opportunity to provide you with a fully customized cleaning program for your workplace. Night after night we take great pride in providing only the best in service. Why not let us provide it for you?

lenders.name: Ben

lenders.name: Yann

lenders.occupational_info: I work for the mail order industry.  My job consists in delivering ideas that make my patron's customers happy to purchase from them.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: clerical

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in an unhelpful world.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial business consulting... lecture Principles of Microeconomics on occasion at Virginia Commonwealth University.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: God directs me to as a steward for His kingdom.
lenders.occupational_info: I pray and and ask God for clear directions  on what to do with money.  Then I do what He tells me.  Its enjoyable work.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe there is a need for help that contributes to raising the independence and the self-esteem of the client, rather than help that keeps the recipient in a state of dependence and inferiority. That's why I want to make a part of my private means available for emerging market entrepreneurs with a capital need.
lenders.occupational_info:
My support will primarily go individuals and cooperatives with the most moderate funding needs. That way I hope to reach out and help as many of my fellow human beings that I possibly can and to make a positive impact on their life and future prospects.
In my own daily life I work for NOKIA making mobile phone applications and services particularly addressing the needs of people in emerging market countries.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: I'm cool.

lenders.name: Greener LA
lenders.loan_because: We understand that a single person has the potential to make an enormous impact on our world and environment.  We loan because we care about our fellow citizens of the world and we believe in working together for a better tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: Greener L.A. is Southern California's premier home and commercial cleaning company. We are committed to cleaning with a conscience in order to benefit the health and lives of our customers. Commercially, we are dedicated to working with businesses to create progressive sustainability solutions to reduce their carbon footprint and detoxicate their working environment to the benefit of employees and the planet.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to help another human being.

lenders.name: RBH International
lenders.loan_because: Though the struggles of life can seem insurmountable at times; the kindness and support from friends can foster hope for a better tomorrow.  I believe in the loan recipients, the lenders and Kiva. It is my pleasure and honor to help.  Best of Luck!
lenders.occupational_info:
RBH International is a dynamic business development company.  
" We nurture ideas and dreams until they come true"

lenders.loan_because: Help other children and their moms live better lives.

lenders.name: Bruna
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people with great ideas who are trying to earn a living in an honest and hard-working manner.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an eighth grade student at Meadow Montessori School in Monroe, Michigan.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to provide a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Because of my mother who started loaning in 2007. I continue to loan in loving memory of her and her generosity.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: Informing the public about politics and their government.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful to Kiva for providing a way of loaning money, in small amounts that I can afford, to people who need it, and allowing them to repay at a rate that they can afford. This gives me a way to help others around the world, even if it is only in a small way. Thank you, Kiva!

lenders.name: Tormey
lenders.loan_because: I'm a student, so I don't have much money, and Kiva is a place where I can give my money and not lose it forever. I'm helping people, and in the long run I don't lose anything, even if I have to make small sacrifices to begin with.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student, studying the International Baccalaureate (IB) at The Friends' School in Hobart, Tasmania, Australia. I am taking seven subjects: English, Maths, Chinese (second language), Biology, Chemistry, Philosophy and ToK. ToK stands for "Theory of Knowlegde" and we ask questions like "How do we know things?" and "How are we sure that we are right? Are we sure?"

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I believe that educated, creative women are the hope of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing, I'm a painter, I sing with a blues band.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: It's fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people cope with life and improve their relationships.

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: I seek to make a positive difference in the world we live in
lenders.occupational_info: I build ideas into tools that save the lives of people

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: My Captain asked me to.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught biology classes for college students.

lenders.name: Keri
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a bigger difference for the world than I can locally in our rich nation.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a singer, creating music, which has the power to transform people emotionally.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a small thing I can do with great love.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, I study and learn, a lot. I make money by talking on the phone for a few hours every day.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: My small business changed my life and someone helped me.  Their name was Citibank.  I want to do the same thing for others on a much smaller scale without the crippling interest rate.
lenders.occupational_info: I make jewelry, silkscreen clothing and sell craft components.

lenders.name: Hippy
lenders.loan_because: my pet squirrel will beat me up if I don't.

lenders.name: toxic4brain
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of microfinance and the way Kive handles that, with the peer to peer transactions.
Its the best way to give people & later maybe the hole Region, the opportunity to finance their lifes and Familys.
lenders.occupational_info:
i am married, have 3 kids & i help people with computers and their networks.

Life`s a wave, enjoy the ride :)

lenders.name: Keren
lenders.loan_because: The best way to lift some out of poverty is to give them the means to do it themself.

lenders.name: Kodyonthekeys
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to be a resource, enabling people to better themselves and their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a postbac student of biology at ASU, hoping to study Entomology in grad school at Texas A&M. I'm currently doing undergrad research on population dynamics of Tribolium confusum. While prepping to do my Masters, I'm working for Apple, Inc.

lenders.name: Spotlight
lenders.loan_because: Spotlight on New York City. A free video business directory for New York City… Home, Health & Wellness, Restaurants/Entertainment, Retail and Services.Video marketing is a must for all businesses

lenders.name: Eben
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the resources to help themselves in the way they know is best for them. I believe a loan should carry an agreement of repayment, not a commitment to 'structural adjustment', privatisation and the loss of the borrower's rights and dignity.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I got interrested in the microfinance concept long time back and like this concept to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Tonje
lenders.loan_because: The reason why I loan is as simple as: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying economics at the moment.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Everything I have belongs to God.

lenders.name: Lucien
lenders.loan_because:
i "HAPPENED" to be born in one of the richest countries. I wish to share this blessing with others.
Besides, i have a strong faith in MUTUAL AID. If i help someone start business, maybe one of them could HIRE ME. Then, it's a win-win, right?
